snippet: A panel that is attempting to devise a way to tell consumers what data is being collected about them by mobile apps has had a hard time getting along, let alone reaching an agreement.
abstract: A panel that is attempting to devise a way to tell consumers what data is being collected about them by mobile apps has had a hard time getting along, let alone reaching an agreement.
lead_paragraph: A panel that is attempting to devise a way to tell consumers what data is being collected about them by mobile apps has had a hard time getting along, let alone reaching an agreement, Natasha Singer writes in her Slipstream column in The New York Times. Read more »

headline.main: Moving Toward Mobile App Transparency in Fits and Starts
